features: 4 Light Modes: base-unit LED on / String LED's on Low (15 Lumens) / Medium (50 Lumens) / High (100 Lumens)
Lasts up to 20 hours on low setting
Charges in 12-14 hours via direct sunlight / 6-8 hours via USB
One-way 1A USB Port for charging mobile devices: Charges most smartphones 30-50%
USB plug for charging base unit battery
18 ft of kink-resistant, braided nylon cord
Height: 7 cm / 2.8 in open | 5 cm / 2.5 in closed
